Key Match Events: Chaos baseball smiled at the Guardians, giving the Tigers a cold shoulder in ALDS Game 1
Post-Match Reflections: It is one thing to court chaos. It is another thing to control it.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on October 5, 2024, in ALDS Game 1 between the Cleveland Guardians and the Detroit Tigers
Others: The article discusses the unpredictability of the game, comparing it to lightning that can be beautiful to watch but frightening because it can turn on you at any moment
